pullRequest.title: [Plugin] For recent versions of Gradle, use .convention to provide the default
pullRequest.bodyText:
This allows to call customTypeMap.put()
fixes #2802

commit.message:
For recent versions of Gradle, use .convention to provide the default

This allows to call `customTypeMap.put()`

nodes.bodyText: Seeing as Gradle is not up to 6.7 with 7 around the corner it doesn't feel unreasonable to require 6.2+
